meanings.definition: A pattern of stripes that cross each other at right angles, typically in different colors.
meanings.sent1: The plaid on his shirt had red and blue stripes.
meanings.sent2: She wore a plaid skirt to the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The plaid on the picnic blanket made it easy to spot in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The plaid of the city streets crisscrossed like a colorful maze.
meanings.sent5: The plaid design on the tablecloth was so vibrant it almost seemed to move.

meanings.definition: A piece of clothing made from plaid fabric.
meanings.sent1: He bought a plaid jacket for the winter.
meanings.sent2: The plaid dress she wore was her favorite.
meanings.sent3: The plaid scarf kept her warm on the chilly day.
meanings.sent4: The plaid shirt was like a cozy hug on a cold morning.
meanings.sent5: The plaid pants added a pop of color to his outfit.

meanings.definition: To decorate with a plaid pattern.
meanings.sent1: She decided to plaid the walls of her room for a unique look.
meanings.sent2: They plaided the picnic table for the outdoor party.
meanings.sent3: He plaided the gift box to make it stand out.
meanings.sent4: The artist plaided the canvas with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The decorator plaided the room with a mix of patterns for a bold style.
